name: Egg Curry
steps: Boil eggs and peel them.
Prepare tomato-onion gravy with turmeric, coriander, and spices.
Add eggs to the gravy and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or roti.

name: Masala Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with chopped onion, tomato, chili, and spices.
Heat a pan and pour the mixture.
Cook 3-4 minutes on each side.
Serve hot with toast or paratha.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Prepare tomato-onion gravy with butter and spices.
Add paneer cubes and simmer for 5-10 minutes.
Add cream before serving.
Serve hot with naan or roti.

name: Aloo Gobi
steps: Chop potatoes and cauliflower.
Prepare onion-tomato gravy with turmeric and spices.
Add vegetables and cook until tender.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

name: Masala Dosa
steps: Soak rice and urad dal overnight and grind to batter.
Prepare potato filling with onion, chili, and spices.
Cook dosa on a hot pan and fill with potato masala.
Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

name: Idli
steps: Soak rice and urad dal with fenugreek seeds overnight.
Grind to smooth batter and ferment for 8 hours.
Pour batter in idli molds and steam for 10-12 minutes.
Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

name: Upma
steps: Roast semolina lightly.
Prepare tempering with onion, chili, ginger, and curry leaves.
Add water and bring to boil, then add semolina gradually.
Cook until thick, serve hot.

name: Chole Masala
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight and boil until soft.
Prepare onion-tomato gravy with ginger, garlic, and spices.
Add chickpeas and simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Serve hot with bhature or rice.

name: Jeera Rice
steps: Wash and soak rice for 20 minutes.
Heat ghee and add cumin seeds.
Add rice and water, cook until done.
Serve with curry or dal.

name: Pav Bhaji
steps: Boil and mash vegetables.
Prepare onion-tomato gravy with pav bhaji masala.
Mix mashed vegetables into gravy and simmer.
Serve hot with buttered pav.

name: Rava Kesari
steps: Roast semolina in ghee until fragrant.
Boil water with sugar and saffron.
Add roasted semolina gradually and cook until thick.
Serve warm.

name: Besan Ladoo
steps: Roast gram flour in ghee until aromatic.
Mix with sugar and cardamom powder.
Shape into small balls while warm.
Allow to cool and serve.

name: Dhokla
steps: Prepare batter with gram flour, yogurt, and spices.
Steam batter for 15-20 minutes.
Tempering with mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Serve with chutney.

name: Pesarattu
steps: Soak moong dal and grind with ginger and chili.
Spread batter on hot pan and cook both sides.
Serve with chutney.

name: Poha
steps: Rinse poha and drain.
Prepare tempering with onion, chili, mustard seeds, turmeric, and curry leaves.
Mix poha with tempering and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot with lemon.

name: Aloo Paratha
steps: Prepare dough with wheat flour.
Mash potatoes with chili and coriander.
Roll dough, fill with potato mixture, and cook on tawa with ghee.
Serve hot with curd or pickle.

name: Methi Thepla
steps: Prepare dough with wheat flour, methi leaves, spices, and yogurt.
Roll into thin flatbreads and cook on hot tawa.
Serve hot with chutney.

name: Vegetable Upma
steps: Roast semolina lightly.
Prepare tempering with onion, curry leaves, and spices.
Add chopped vegetables and water, then semolina.
Cook until thick and serve hot.

name: Gajar Halwa
steps: Grate carrots and cook in milk until soft.
Add sugar, ghee, and cardamom, and cook until dry.
Serve warm.

name: Kachori
steps: Prepare dough and filling with moong dal and spices.
Stuff dough and deep fry until golden.
Serve hot.

name: Litti Chokha
steps: Prepare wheat dough and sattu filling with spices.
Bake or fry litti, and serve with chokha made of mashed potatoes and tomatoes.
Serve hot.

name: Rasgulla
steps: Prepare chhena balls.
Boil in sugar syrup until soft and spongy.
Serve chilled.

name: Rava Idli
steps: Prepare batter with semolina and yogurt.
Steam in idli molds for 10-12 minutes.
Serve hot with chutney.

name: Puri Bhaji
steps: Prepare wheat dough and roll into small puris.
Deep fry puris until golden brown.
Prepare potato bhaji with onion, turmeric, and spices.
Serve together.

name: Chicken Curry
steps: Prepare onion-tomato gravy with ginger, garlic, and spices.
Add chicken and cook until tender.
Serve hot with rice or roti.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Cook chicken pieces until tender.
Prepare tomato cream gravy with butter and spices.
Add chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Dal Tadka
steps: Boil dal until soft.
Prepare tadka with ghee, garlic, onion, and spices.
Add tadka to dal and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

name: Rajma Masala
steps: Soak rajma overnight and cook until soft.
Prepare onion-tomato gravy with spices.
Add rajma and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

name: Palak Paneer
steps: Blanch spinach and grind to puree.
Prepare onion-tomato gravy with spices.
Add spinach puree and paneer, simmer for 5-10 minutes.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

name: Vegetable Biryani
steps: Cook rice and vegetables separately.
Layer rice and vegetables with yogurt and spices.
Cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with raita.

name: Gulab Jamun
steps: Make small balls of khoya and flour.
Deep fry in ghee until golden.
Soak in sugar syrup flavored with cardamom.
Serve warm or cold.

name: Methi Malpua
steps: Prepare batter with flour, milk, fenugreek leaves, and sugar.
Fry small pancakes in ghee until golden brown.
Serve with syrup or condensed milk.

name: Vegetable Sandwich
steps: Layer vegetables and cheese between slices of bread.
Toast sandwich until golden.
Serve hot.

name: Masala Chai
steps: Boil water with tea leaves and spices.
Add milk and sugar, simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Strain and serve hot.
